title: PlayerPro 3.04 + DSP & Widget Pack
description:
Player Pro has a beautiful, fast and intuitive interface, as well as c powerful audio configuration options.

Key features:
Browse and play your music by albums, artists, genres, songs, playlists, folders, and album artists.
Music and video browser / player.
Choose an album cover, artist pictures and genre illustrations from various sources: the Internet, the Gallery app, ID3-tags (embedded artwork), or album folder.
Change the user interface of the player, install one of the 20+ available skins.
Customize the layout, choosing between Grid or List views.
View the lyrics of built-in ID3 tags of music files.
Mixing audio effects for Android> 2.3 devices: 5 band graphic equalizer with default / customizable presets, stereo widening effect, reverb effects (large hall, medium hall, plate, small room, medium room, large room), bass boost effect, volume control .
Free additional DSP plugin 10-band graphic equalizer with 15 default / customizable presets, control PRE-AMP, BASS BOOST control, monitoring stereo widening, left-right volume control. Gapless playback. Automatic / manual CROSSFADE. Replay Gain. Audio Limiter. Go to Settings> Audio and select "Download DSP pack" to install the free plugin.
Music statistics and smart playlists: Recently added, Top rated, Most Viewed, Recently played, Least played. Build additional custom playlists using the Smart Playlist Editor and many different criteria it offers: album, artist, genre, title, play / skip counts, last played / added, rating, is a podcast, duration, year, way file, etc. All smart playlists AUTO-UPDATE.
Import and export music history and ratings from your favorite desktop music player.
Selecting a folder Music.
Selection of 2 lock screen widgets with many customization options: unlock slider, sound Toggler, skip tracks using volume buttons, gestures, background selection, controls selection, time display, skin selection ...
The choice of 5 different widgets, home screen (4x1, 2x2, 3x3, 4x4, 4x2). All widgets are customizable and skinnable: 6 different skins available, the ability to display artist picture instead of album artwork, option to display estimates the shuffle / repeat controls etc.
Support Status Notification: display album artwork, title, album and artist, play / pause, skip forward and stop CONTROLS (ICS) in the status notification.
Most popular SCROBBLERS supported.
Sleep timer with damping.
Text notifications, album / artist painting on your favorite social networks.
Support headset. Switch long press and double / triple press actions.
A library with a wide range of search. Search support voice control
Swipe gestures (player: swipe album art to skip songs, browsers: swipe left to play next, swipe right to play last).
Function Shake: shake the phone to move to the next song, the next / previous song (eg: shake top to bottom or bottom to top to play next / previous song).

Changes in version 3.04:
Complete revamp of the UI
Support of the action bar
Multi selection mode and item contextual menus
Navigation drawer
Favorites
Album artwork gestures and quick actions
Redesign of the now playing queue
Redesign of the video browser
And many new features ...
Updated translations
A few bug fixes
